dcterms:creator: N. Silberman
D. Hoiem
P. Kohli
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: NYUDv2 is an indoor RGB-D semantic segmentation dataset containing 1449 RGB-D images with pixel-wise labels, depth maps captured by Kinect, and corresponding camera intrinsic parameters.
dcterms:title: NYUDv2

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran

M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: Cityscapes is an urban scene understanding dataset containing 5,000 stereo frames, each with an RGB image, disparity map, camera parameters, and a fine-annotated 19-category ground truth label map.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
